Text:
Comment on quality and pls seed........
sample included.......

Hoping this works out!  Usually avoid MKV that seems to glitch out, but I am no super genius about encoding.  Nice balance between file size and good quality.  VLC (an old open source fave!) is supposed to handle MKV and downloaded CCC.  Am I on the right track?  

Anyway, +++ to MitZep +++ who encourages feedback and SEED!  Catch you on that fb link. (-:
good copy A10/V10 better than some of the BRRips i've seen thanks alot this is my first download from you am sure looking forward to check out more of your work
Quality and sound are impressive for a 760MB File. Had some trouble opening it with MPClassic and DivX though. I'm no genius in encoding either. However, worked well in VLC. Good for me.
The print's good enough and the sound's fine too. I'd say A/V - 9/9
